S: Don't forget to take the ace that I've updated for you.

SOUND_MENU: 大家好，  我叫零碳贝尔，出生 (1)

PwS%iPdm(+]0OeL4^mLX: Hello, I‘m Bell from the Zero Carbon family. I was born in Shanghai Disney.
I heard that there is a beautiful village called Lianmin village next to Disney. I want to explore it!  Let's go.

SOUND_MENU: 西仔，除了智慧乡村，这些装备还

PwS%iPdm(+]0OeL4^mLX: Xi Zai, where can these equipment be used in addition to smart villages?

SOUND_MENU: 哇，是化工园区，我们赶紧过去看

PwS%iPdm(+]0OeL4^mLX: Wow, it's the chemical industry park. Let's go and have a look!

sounds.name: 哇，是化工园区，我们赶紧过去看
西仔，除了智慧乡村，这些装备还
大家好，  我叫零碳贝尔，出生 (1)

SOUND_MENU: 走，带上我给你升级的神秘武器。 (1)

PwS%iPdm(+]0OeL4^mLX: Don't forget to take the ace that I've updated for you.

SOUND_MENU: 恭喜你顺利完成连民村的冒险之旅

PwS%iPdm(+]0OeL4^mLX: Congratulations on successfully completing your adventure in Lianmin village. I believe you have mastered many skills.

SOUND_MENU: 我是来自遥远的一八四七星球的西

PwS%iPdm(+]0OeL4^mLX: I'm Xi Yumin from the distant 1847 planet. You can call me Xizai.

SOUND_MENU: 听说你要探险，我给你准备了几个 (1)

PwS%iPdm(+]0OeL4^mLX: I have prepared some equipment for you in the exploration. Find them and you can successfully complete your adventure!

SOUND_MENU: 有许多西门子工业基础更好的垂直 (2)

PwS%iPdm(+]0OeL4^mLX: Vertical industries with a better industrial foundation of Siemens can adopt them. Let's see where to go.
